SummaryEnglish: VS Knight Lamune & 40 Fire is the "next generation" of the Lamune series. Baba Lamunade is followed home by two strange peddler girls who give him a CD-rom game. After he beats "The Legend of Lamuness", the girls come out of his computer and bring him to DokiDoki Space. He is the third descendant of the hero Lamuness who must stop Don Genosai from resurrecting the great evil Abraham. Accompanied by PQ, his advisor robot, and the two Lamuness no miko - Parfait and Cacao - he must pilot the Kaizer Fire mecha. However, he needs another pilot, and Da Cider is the only man for the job! Together they search for the gates to the different zones of DokiDoki Space and encounter other friends and enemies. Why is Lamunade having flashbacks? And just who the heck are those two in those goofy costumes?? VS Knight Lamune & 40 Fire is a television series that also spawned an OVA series (Fresh) that was released as Knights of Ramune.
Aliases: バーサスナイト ラムネアンドフォーティーファイアー
